content: garibaldi |garibaldi| ear warmer knitting pattern garibaldi is named after garibaldi provincial park located outside whistler bc canada i hiked and camped at the glacier in july 2019 and it was absolutely amazing garibaldi is a classic knit ear warmer made with super bulky yarn it has a unique stitch texture which creates interest in this simple knit garibaldi knits up quickly and is ideal for scrap yarn this is a great knit for an advanced beginner garibaldi |details| sizes available abbreviations one size adult to fit an average head size of inches 21-23 | 53-58 5 cm * repeat
